data.Name: Nick Waterhouse
data.Bio: Nick Waterhouse (born Nicholas Ryan Waterhouse on 8 February 1986) is an American singer, songwriter, and record producer from Los Angeles. Waterhouse plays rhythm and blues music that is raw and rhythmic and vital. Conceived in the bedrooms, MUNI commutes, and DJ booths of San Francisco, and recorded in his all-analog studio in Southern California,his self-produced 2010 single Some Place garnered a sell-out pressing and coverage from the likes of The San Francisco Chronicle Read more on Last.fm
